title: The Sweet Life: Secretly Married to a Movie Star - Novel Updates
author: Yan Luo
description:
“Best Actress Xia, do you have a boyfriend?” 

“Best Actress Xia, do you know that Director Han wants to court you? Will you say yes to him?” 

Xia Yishan rubbed between her eyebrows. “No, I don't know anything about that. No comment, thanks.” 

As the crowd clamored on, a tiny red book fell out of Best Actor Su’s pocket. A nearby reporter picked it up. “Good heavens! It’s the marriage certificate of Su Jingting and Xia Yishan!” 

Su Jingting went to Xia Yishan and grabbed her round the waist. He said to the reporters who asked the questions earlier, “She doesn't have a boyfriend but a husband. Tell Han Zimo to stop dreaming.” 

‘Hey, hey, hey! What happened to keeping our marriage a secret?!’>
